summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on September 22, 2021, with a Federal Bureau of Prisons (BOP) Unit Manager at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of an official OIG investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The memorandum notes the interview was recorded and transcribed, and lists several attachments including the transcript, a signed warnings form, an earlier FBI 302 interview of the manager, and a memorandum written by the manager.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; a previously housed inmate at MCC New York who died.

persons.name: Unit Manager
persons.role: Unit Manager, Federal Bureau of Prisons
persons.context: The individual interviewed by OIG agents; was responsible for several units at MCC New York, including the Special Housing Unit, when Epstein was housed there.

connections.description: The Special Agent, along with the Assistant Special Agent in Charge, conducted a voluntary interview of the Unit Manager as part of the OIG investigation.
The Assistant Special Agent in Charge, along with the Special Agent, conducted a voluntary interview of the Unit Manager as part of the OIG investigation.
The Unit Manager was responsible for several units at MCC New York, including the Special Housing Unit, when inmate Jeffrey Epstein was housed there.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Unit Manager
events.description: Special Agent and Assistant Special Agent in Charge from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary, recorded interview of a BOP Unit Manager at MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI 302 Interview of Unit Manager

events.title: Unit Manager's Memorandum on Epstein
events.description: The BOP Unit Manager wrote a memorandum regarding Jeffrey Epstein, which is listed as an attachment to this OIG memorandum.

keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is conducting an official investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
A BOP Unit Manager at MCC New York, who was responsible for units including the Special Housing Unit when Epstein was housed there, was voluntarily interviewed by OIG agents on September 22, 2021.

The interview was recorded and transcribed, and the memorandum lists several attachments including the transcript, a signed warnings form, an FBI 302 from August 2019, and a memorandum written by the Unit Manager in August 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein's BOP register number is listed as 76318-054.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum that contains neither recommendations nor conclusions and is restricted from distribution outside the receiving agency.
